summary: Completed testing of updated QSR Loyalty App with Supabase migration and new features. Backend 100% functional, admin user creation working, redeem store properly disabled. Found minor frontend text issues with Perfect 5 Game branding.

ui_bugs.issue: Still shows 'Perfect 10 Game' instead of 'Perfect 5 Game'
Instructions still say 'Stop the oven at exactly 10 seconds!' instead of 5 seconds

design_issues.issue: One redeem button still detected (likely 'Browse Rewards' button)

passed_tests: Backend API - All 18 endpoints (100% success rate) with Supabase PostgreSQL
Admin create user with name and points via 'Add User' tab
Admin add points to existing users functionality
User login with Supabase (John Smith with 500 points)
All Members tab displays 5 users from Supabase
Leaderboard correctly shows users ranked by lifetime points from Supabase
Perfect 5 Game page title correctly shows 'Perfect 5 Challenge'
Redeem store shows 'Redemption Coming Soon' banner
Point progress indicators working in rewards
action_item_for_main_agent: Update dashboard game card text from 'Perfect 10 Game' to 'Perfect 5 Game' and change instructions from '10 seconds' to '5 seconds'. Verify no redeem buttons remain in store.
